featured.text: This morning, two men from the village of Roaboia led us into the forest.

definition.zh_def: 一種特定的植物或動物，通常用於科學或生物學的研究。
definition.en_def: A specific type of plant or animal, often used in scientific or biological studies.
definition.example: The researchers focused on the roaboia to understand its unique adaptations.
